chapters.title: Chapter 2:  Strangers
chapters.info: Moiraine Damodred, p. 20—Guest in Emond's Field the day before Bel Tine. She has large dark eyes and keeps her dark hair in ringlets. She barely comes to Rand's chest. She is an Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah, and came to Emond's Field to find Rand, Mat, and Perrin. See also Alys; Mandragoran, Lan.
